ICSA-17-094-05 Rockwell Automation ControlLogix 5580 and CompactLogix 5380 (Update A)

product.name: ControlLogix 5580 controllers: V28.011 V28.012 and V28.013

notes.text: This vulnerability may allow an attacker to cause a denial of service condition by sending a series of specific CIP-based commands to the controller.CVE-2017-6024 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 6.8 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:N/AC:H/PR:N/UI:N/S:C/C:N/I:N/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary
